page.title: 15LEOMINSTER BUS STATION
page.content: The bus station in{Leominster}is in Dishley Street. It will soon be moved to nearby Internatoinal Supermarket. There are three islands for loadind and unloading passengers. Bus Station facilities are a cafe toilets, telephone box, chip shop, freezer shop, freezer centre, large car park, shelter and a Primrose Motor booking office. There are two entrances to the bus station, one is from Dishley Street and the other is from Bargates. Both of these are from very busy roads. The town services go to Barons Cross and the Leominster Junior School. Buses also go to Hereford and Worcester, Birmingham via Ludlow or Tenbury, Kington via Presteigne and Aberystwyth via Kington. There is also a regular coach on Saturdays to London. The station is used by seven bus companies.
